name: Color Slide (taleofluthien)
description:
This game is a hyper casual game where you aim to increase the number of stick men by changing their color. 

In this exciting mobile game, you will have to swipe and change the colors of your little guys to overcome obstacles and increase your population. With simple, intuitive controls and challenging gameplay, this game will definitely provide hours of fun. As you progress through the levels, you will face the big boss and you will need to do strategic planning to be victorious. Fill your army of little guys and take down the boss in this exciting game.
